name: Captain Retro
description:
CONTROLS:

Player 1 = Arrow Keys (UP Arrow to Jump)

Player 2 = W, S, A and D (W is to Jump)

Captain Retro (Published in 2002-2003 from memory) was drawn, animated and scripted and by me. My friend Brendon and I constructed the levels together. This was a load of fun and my cousin and I had a blast playing this two player back in the day. While it's far from a smooth platformer, it still holds a place in my heart as the second game I made. The music is a whacky and weird concoction I made from splicing different music together, it sounds somewhere between awful and catchy.
